verbs.description: UPDATE : [ARG0: The White House] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Saturday morning] [ARG1: that first lady Melania Trump was released from the hospital today and is resting comfortably at the White House] .
UPDATE : The White House announced Saturday morning that first lady Melania Trump [V: was] released from the hospital today and is resting comfortably at the White House .
UPDATE : The White House announced Saturday morning that [ARG1: first lady Melania Trump] was [V: released] [ARG2: from the hospital] [ARGM-TMP: today] and is resting comfortably at the White House .
UPDATE : The White House announced Saturday morning that first lady Melania Trump was released from the hospital today and [V: is] resting comfortably at the White House .

UPDATE : The White House announced Saturday morning that [ARG1: first lady Melania Trump] was released from the hospital today and is [V: resting] [ARGM-MNR: comfortably] [ARGM-LOC: at the White House] .
